amendment.description: To insert provisions relating to antibiotic access and innovation and certain enantiomer drugs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1009 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1009 proposed by Senator Brown for Senator Hatch. (consideration: CR S5699-5705) To insert provisions relating to antibiotic access and innovation and certain enantiomer drugs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1009 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1009 proposed by Senator Brown for Senator Hatch.
